posts.title: My 1st Post
posts.body: It is so easy to be great nowadays

posts.title: My 2nd Post
posts.body: The moment you assume somebody is smarter than you, they immediately become stupid

posts.title: My 3rd Post
posts.body: Living with the Communists long enough makes me understand how selfish and stupid they are

posts.title: My 4th Post
posts.body: There are no Logical Reasons to choose the Communists. Yet, Northerners chose them anyway. What a bunch of idiots

posts.title: Mortal Kombat 1
posts.body:
There are new things, new information about this new game, Mortal Kombat 1(2023 version), that Ed Boon and Netherrealm Studios just published recently.
This game takes place after the event of Mortal Kombat 11 Aftermath.
In that game, Fire God Kang Liu defeated Shang Tsung in a one-on-one match, resulting in Kang Liu defeating Shang Tsung, crafted the new timeline, and Kang Liu returned to the era of the Great Kung Lao, Kung Lao's ancestor.
And, Raiden also joined Kang Liu in this quest, too.

posts.body: Season 3 of this show has begun yesterday

posts.body:
This thing is banned for a week now. I have violated the rules I set up, so I have to face the punishment.
